0x2703D582.name: SET_WEATHER_OWNED_BY_NETWORK

params.name: network
params.description: true to let the network control weather, false to not use network weather behavior.

0x2703D582.description:
Sets whether or not the weather should be owned by the network subsystem.

To be able to use [\_SET_WEATHER_TYPE_TRANSITION](#\_0x578C752848ECFA0C), this has to be set to false.
